entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the main characters in the story, described as looking wildly around and whispering to Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is another main character in the story, described as looking up at a giant clock with a sickening feeling.

entities.name: mum
entities.description: Mum is Ron's mother, mentioned by Ron as possibly not being able to get back through to them.

entities.name: dad

entities.name: dursleys
entities.description: The Dursleys are Harry's cruel and neglectful relatives, mentioned by Harry as not giving him pocket money for about six years.
